abilities.name: Captain'S Mark
info: When Captain Hook attacks an enemy without Armor or Lure, he applies a Mark. Only one enemy can be Marked at a time.
When a Marked enemy gains Armor or Lure, Mark is removed.
Captain Hook gains a 20% Attack Buff against Marked enemies.
If Captain Hook is the only Guardian attacking a Marked enemy, the enemy gains a -10% Attack Debuff.
When a Marked enemy is defeated, Captain Hook gains a 15% Attack Buff for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Duelist'S Edge
info: Captain Hook deals 4 hits, totaling 300% damage and inflicts Knock Back.
An additional 300% damage is dealt if the enemy is Marked.
If this defeats an enemy, Captain Hook gains 10% Attack Buff until the end of the Encounter. (Max Stacks: 4)

abilities.name: Rising Revenge
info: Captain Hook's Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to Purge 1 Buff from a Marked enemy.
The chance to Purge 1 Buff increases by 5% for each consecutive Basic Attack on the same target, up to 35%.

talents.name: Captain's Cutlass
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Captain's Spyglass
talents.info: Grants +20% Focus at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Durable Doublet
talents.info: Gain a 30% Defense Buff when fighting a Marked enemy target.

talents.name: Pirate's Blockade
talents.info: Captain Hook's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to Heal Block a Marked enemy for 10 seconds. Enemies cannot receive a new Heal Block until the old one expires. Captain Hook's Special Ability has a 100% chance for the same effect.

talents.name: Slashing Strike
talents.info: Captain Hook's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to Wound a Marked enemy, dealing 15% damage per second, for 4 seconds. Captain Hook's Special Ability has a 100% chance for the same effect. [Max Stacks: 1]

talents.name: Overboard
talents.info: If two or more enemies are targeting Captain Hook, his Basic Attacks have a 20% chance to Knock Back his targeted enemy and Stun them for 1 second(s). This Knock Back does not affect Bosses. Captain Hook's Special Ability has a 50% chance for the same effect.
